content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Trade and Export Controls\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Being a multinational company EPAM must comply with trade and export control legislation in all countries where EPAM operates. The definition of controlled products can significantly vary and go beyond military or national security related products, technologies or services. Where you have doubts about particular technology being used, please consult Compliance Officer for assistance in determining whether export restrictions apply and how to comply.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM must also comply with sanctions and trade embargoes posed by governments of the countries where EPAM operates. The sanctions usually imply freeze of assets of particular individuals, organisations or governments, and barring trade in certain products/services or certain types of transactions. Penalties for non-compliance with sanctions and trade embargoes may be severe including fines on the involved companies and fines and prison sentences on individuals. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM has screening procedures in place that cover all of EPAM customers, vendors, subcontractors and employees. In case you need to ensure that potential or existing EPAM's partner is not subject to any sanctions and embargoes or have questions on screening process, please consult WFA Finance Internal Audit or Compliance Officer. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please read the abstract on trade and export controls and screening procedures from EPAM Code of Conduct: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"c. Trade & Export Controls & Anti-Boycott\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Complex trade and export control laws limit where EPAM can send or receive EPAM's or EPAM's clients' products, services or technical information. These laws also control whether or not a particular individual or entity from a particular country can be provided access to it.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The definition of controlled products, services and technology is complex and broad. It is broader than military-use products, services or information. It can encompass commercial use products, services, information or technical data (such as encryption source code). Make sure to understand the specifics of the particular technology (such as the client's export control number for the technology or whether encryption source code is involved) and consult the Compliance Officer for assistance in determining whether export restrictions apply and how to comply.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It may be necessary for EPAM or its client or business partner to obtain an export control license from the government or to confirm with our client that client has done so and for EPAM to staff accordingly.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM also must comply with economic sanctions and embargoes that a country in which EPAM does business has adopted. As a company with headquarters in the United States, EPAM complies with economic sanctions and embargoes imposed against certain countries and individuals by the U.S. government. You should screen third parties against the U. S. OFAC list and other country lists identified by EPAM using EPAM's screening processes and automated tools as set forth in EPAM's supporting policies and procedures. Take care not to participate in international boycotts that are not sanctioned by the U.S. government.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
